name: Gender Circles (Windows)
description:
Objective: Collect all the gender circles according to genders symbol color as long as you can.

Instruction:

1. Press  left/right arrow keys to move the male gender symbol. 2. Press A/D to move the female gender symbol. 3. Press Escape to pause the game. 4. Red Star will increase your movement speed. 5. Orange Star will create a shield around you. 6. SkyBlue Star will slow the movement everything that goes to you.
